messages.subject: Awaji Island Rebellion
messages.msgSnippet: My turn ! My turn !       I am looking for any information that we can collectively come up with on the Kogo Inncident that took place on Awaji
messages.messageBody:
My turn ! My turn !
 
  
 I am looking for any information that we can collectively come up with on the "Kogo Inncident" that took place on Awaji Island in.. umm... 1869 I think ?
 
     The Inada on Awaji tried to break from the Hachisuka in Awa--- but what I am trying to get clear is exactly why... I have heard two different stories.
 
         Any help is appreciated. Thank you !




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
